Cleaning the
bowl
and the
spoon
with which one tempers the
sand
Be careful to clean, as soon as & quickly after you have cast, your
bowl
& your
spatula
or
spoon
with which you temper your
sand
, because
il
if it dries in them, it crumbles & falls into the
fresh sand
& makes a hole or a fault in the work. Also, when the
mold
is reheated, these little pieces crust up & flake off & prevent neat casting.
